settings.promo_modal_heading: Sign up for 20% off your first order.
settings.promo_modal_disclaimer: Valid one per customer. Promo code is valid for whitening, oral care, and aligner accessory items in the SmileDirectClub Store. By submitting you are opting in to receive marketing communications from SmileDirectClub. (Privacy policy)
settings.promo_modal_success_heading: Thank you! Here is your code.
settings.promo_modal_success_message: Add this code to your order, and the discount will be applied at checkout.
settings.promo_modal_success_disclaimer: Valid one per customer. Promo code is not valid for gift cards or Gift of a Smile. By submitting you are opting in to receive marketing communications from SmileDirectClub. (Privacy policy)
settings.announcement_bar_text: A deal that will make you smile: FREE SHIPPING for orders over $50

settings.headline: Brush better. For less.
settings.text: Save up to 20% on our premium electric toothbrushes with new lower prices.

settings.title: Looking for retainers?
settings.text:
It would be a shame to lose that brand new smile of yours. And after all the hard work we've done together.

Keep your smile safe with retainers for only $99.

settings.title: Best whitening system I’ve tried
settings.content: I love this whitening system! I still get compliments on how bright my teeth are months after I used it. The gel is easy to apply. The blue light is so convenient being able to plug up with your cell phone for power.
settings.name: Crystal A.

settings.title: Love it!!
settings.content: I’ve only been whitening for a few days and already see a difference in my teeth. I cannot wait to see how they look after full treatment.
settings.name: Dynnesha T.

settings.title: Whiter Brighter Teeth!
settings.content: After only 4 days of using the whitener I can tell my teeth are whiter and brighter!!!! I love it only takes 5 minutes and my teeth aren't sensitive at all, unlike other teeth whitening products I have used.
settings.name: Nikki B.

settings.title: Awesome
settings.content: I just received my teeth whitening kit and it is AMAZING! I had a little problem with my order but customer service was absolutely wonderful and solved the problem right away! Definitely would recommend this product to any and everyone!!
settings.name: Cassandra C.

settings.headline: Another grin changer.
settings.text: Get your brightest bright with bright on™ premium teeth whitening.

settings.headline:
Get started
with a gift card.
settings.text: Give a lifetime of confidence with SmileDirectClub clear aligners.

settings.headline: We put a lot into this case.
settings.text:
This durable case protects your aligners and retainers, keeping them safe and clean.
Now with Built-in Tile™ technology so you never have to worry about losing your aligners or retainers again.

settings.press-blurb: “TBH, receiving the entire package was like getting a mega-gift from the Tooth Fairy.”
“After a few applications, my teeth were about three shades whiter—the formula didn't cause any tooth sensitivity either.“
"Seeing the results, I'm really happy that I opted to take the plunge. I'm really loving my smile."
“I ended up with a visibly whiter, shinier smile. And that, my friends, really made me smile.“

settings.title: Awesome
settings.content: I just received my teeth whitening kit and it is AMAZING! I had a little problem with my order but customer service was absolutely wonderful and solved the problem right away! Definitely would recommend this product to any and everyone!!
settings.name: Cassandra C.

settings.title: Highly recommend!
settings.content: After only 3 days, I have seen an extreme difference already. For the price & convenience of only a few minutes a day, I will never go back to white strips.
settings.name: Ryann C.

settings.title: Lip Balm
settings.content: This lip balm is sacred! It is definitely my go to item throughout the day. I love everything about. The flavor, texture and longevity of Smile Direct Club's lip balm will keep you coming back for more when you run out.
settings.name: Morgan D.

settings.title: Best out there
settings.content: 100% the best hands down! 4 days twice a day with ZERO sensitivity! It's almost too good to be true but the results speak for themselves! I will ALWAYS have this on hand and to give as gifts.
settings.name: Sarah H.

settings.title: I was so skeptical, but this honestly works wonders
settings.content: I've been using this for 3 days now and I can already notice a big difference! I've never been able to use whitening strips because it made my teeth unbearably sensitive. But this leaves my teeth feeling normal! No sensitivity issues!
settings.name: Kelly T.

settings.title: Works and I have sensitive teeth
settings.content: Due to multiple disorders, I have very sensitive teeth. When used as instructed, I've had no issues with sensitivity with this whitening gel and it DOES brighten and whiten.
settings.name: Loreen P.

settings.headline: The machine that freshens and cleans.
settings.text:
Our smile spa™ combines ultrasonic and UV cleaning to tackle 99% of odor-causing bacteria* on aligners, retainers, toothbrush heads, and more.

*5 common odor-causing bacteria: S. aureus, P. aeruginosa, S. mutans, P. loesheii, F. nucleatum.

settings.headline: A better way to floss. No strings attached.
settings.text: Our compact water flosser removes 99% of the plaque between your teeth and below your gumline, where traditional brushing and flossing can’t reach.

settings.headline: Make brushing anything but routine.
settings.text: Two toothpastes to keep your smile clean and fresh. Sensitivity to repair and protect. Whitening to brighten and defend.
